name: Grants for Nonprofits Widget
author: Kurt Turner

sections.description:
Imagine a widget that pulls in new grant opportunities from around the web and aggregates them into one place! This feed of grant opportunities (RFP) is nested into a widget you can easily add to the sidebar of your website. Well you can stop wishing, I’ve put together an aggregation of RSS feeds that serve you grant opportunities daily. The feed is updated multiple times per day so you’ll always see fresh grant request for proposals which your non profit can apply for.

If you know of other RSS feed or ATOM feed sources which can be added to this widget please click the support link on this page and post the website or feed URL for consideration. Thanks to the guys at Easy Grants for supporting this project. Get the RSS feed here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload grantfeed.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via plugin section of your wordpress install
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your sidebar
sections.faq:
How do I add new feeds to the widget?

If you know of other RSS feed or ATOM feed sources which contain nothing but grant opportunities which can be added to this widget please click the support link on this page and post the website or feed URL for consideration.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Added image to description. HTML Clean up.

1.0

Stable to 4.0

short_description: The Grants for Nonprofits Widget is an aggregation of new grant opportunities for nonprofits and other organizations.

screenshots.caption: Sample view of how it will look on your website - the header in this photo (orange bar) is the header used by the website theme - the header used by your website theme is what this widget will use.
